= Issues and Bug Reporting =

The module is far from complete. Below some of the known problems are listed along with how to report bugs.

=== Known Issues ===

Known issues that are deemed worthy is listed here. Others can be found in the issue tracker.

 * No way to ignore files that are not being tracked (issue 3)

 * The status information is not always updated correctly (issue 12)

=== Bug Reporting ===

Did you find a bug? Got an idea for a must-have feature? Want to star an issue and share your opinion about what missing feature is most important to you?

 * [http://code.google.com/p/nbjgit/issues/entry Report an issue]

 * [http://code.google.com/p/nbjgit/issues/advsearch Search issues]

 * [http://code.google.com/p/nbjgit/issues/ View all issues in the issue tracker]
